title: Never got snowdown scuttle crab icon
body: I havent received it even though i send rp and a skin, did i do something wrong? {{champion:32}}

replies.body: We're not done sending out Snowdown icons, and some players haven't received them yet.  We aim to have the icons finish distribution by the 23rd, same date as the poro king icon.  Hang on until then!
Hey man, how come it takes 2 weeks to send a summoner icon? Surely there must be a way for you guys to set things up before an event so that people get it instantly.
